content:
I think that's a perfect choice! Your message is simple, sincere, and conveys your congratulations and good wishes to your coworker. It's a great way to express your happiness for them without being too personal or intrusive.

The message you've chosen is also professional enough to be appropriate for a workplace gift, while still being warm and friendly. I'm sure your coworker will appreciate the thought and kind words you've included with the gift.

Remember, the goal is to show your coworker that you care and are excited for them, and your message does just that. You're not trying to be overly sentimental or emotional, but rather, you're offering a genuine and heartfelt congratulations.

I think you've made an excellent choice, and I'm sure your coworker will be touched by your thoughtful gesture.
